record.id: field.name="upd.control" and file.name="cm3rcatphase" and term=NULL and format.name=NULL and syslanguage="en"
record.field.name: upd.control
record.file.name: cm3rcatphase

brief.brief: Determines whether the phase can be updated.

detail.detail: You can use this field to control Update authority in addition to the Change Management Capability Word cm3r.update.
This example allows Update authority only when the Approval Status of the Request is Pending. (Some Approvals may have been performed against the Request, but not all.):
This example allows Update Authority only when NONE of the Request's Approval Requirements have been met:
With this update control expression, to have Update Authority, an operator must have the necessary Change Management Capability Word and this expression must evaluate to true.
